level_info.name: Programming Terminology
level_info.description: Learn essential programming terms and concepts

questions.explanation: IDE stands for Integrated Development Environment - a software application that provides comprehensive facilities for software development. Popular IDEs include Visual Studio Code, PyCharm, IntelliJ IDEA, and Eclipse.

questions.question_text: What is Git primarily used for?
options: Version control and tracking code changes
questions.explanation: Git is a distributed version control system used to track changes in source code during software development.

options: The rules that define valid code structure
questions.explanation: Syntax refers to the set of rules that defines the combinations of symbols that are considered valid in a programming language.
